headline: Tesla Leadership Shakeup Highlights Higher AI And Robotaxi Execution Risks
summary: Tesla (NasdaqGS:TSLA) is reshaping its executive ranks, with rapid turnover and fresh leadership appointments tied directly to its next phase of activity in AI and autonomous mobility. Raj Jegannathan, who played a key role in AI infrastructure and sales, has exited the company, while Joe Ward has been appointed as global head of sales. These leadership shifts come as Tesla increases its push into robotaxis, AI driven services, and the Optimus humanoid robot alongside its existing vehicle...

headline: Tesla is still a 'long way off' from functional humanoid robots
